title: Can't downgrade to legacy client
body: Every time I try to get back to the old client, the client just kills the program and nothing happens.

replies.body:
How are you returning to the legacy client?  There are two different ways currently, so try them both out:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know what happens!

I cant go back to legacy client by the login screen button either. I can open the alpha just fine but when I click "launch legacy client" just says pvp.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working and shuts it down.

This error is usually caused by a security setting blocking the patcher from opening.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed up.
Thanks a lot, really helped me out :D

The "Launch Legacy Client" doesn't work at all for me.

On the other side, I found the lol.launcher and it works, thank you very much.
